pages.title: Comma Butterfly
pages.text: Polygonia c-album, the comma, is a food generalist ($(o)polyphagous$()) butterfly species belonging to the family Nymphalidae.$(br2)The angular notches on the edges of the forewings are characteristic of the genus Polygonia, which is why species in the genus are commonly referred to as anglewing butterflies.

pages.title: Comma Butterfly
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
